title.value: An Analytic Hierarchy Process based approach for assessing the performance of photovoltaic solar power plants
title.justification: The title explicitly states that the paper is about using an Analytic Hierarchy Process to assess the performance of photovoltaic solar power plants.
title.quote: An Analytic Hierarchy Process based approach for assessing the performance of photovoltaic solar power plants

extractions.description: The paper presents a methodology to assess the performance of photovoltaic solar power plants using the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP). It emphasizes weighting and prioritizing key performance indicators (KPIs) for optimal decision-making in solar plants, integrating a hierarchical decomposition of criteria.

type.justification: The paper proposes a methodology using the Analytic Hierarchy Process for decision-making, which is a theoretical approach.
type.quote: The aim of this article is to present an approach for assessing KPIs using the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) methodology.

name.justification: The primary focus is on photovoltaic solar power plants, which falls under the domain of energy systems.
name.quote: The performance of photovoltaic solar power plants...

name.justification: The paper utilizes the Analytic Hierarchy Process, which is a decision-making tool.
name.quote: This methodology incorporates the Analytic Hierarchy Process, a multicriteria analysis approach designed to assist decision-makers.
